summary: The code is using the Markdown Python library to convert a markdown file (example_docstring_utf8.md) into HTML, applying multiple extensions such as abbr, attr_list, def_list, fenced_code, tables, admonition, smarty, and toc, and storing the result in example_docstring_utf8.html.
